pages.text: The $(d)Lesser Magic Bean$() can be planted to make a Bean Stalk grow upwards.$(br2)It will continue to grow upwards until it hits a block. It functions as a Ladder!
pages.title: Lesser Magic Bean

pages.text: The $(d)Magic Bean$() is a much more powerful version! They cannot be crafted, but can be found in dungeons as well as in $(l:blocks/nature_core)Nature Core$(/l) chests.$(br2)These grow much faster and break through most blocks. Once it reaches the top of the world, it places down a Bean Pod!$(br2)Break it open to collect some rare loot.
pages.title: Magic Bean
